projects.name: World Health Organization Data on Global Air Emissions and Health Impacts
projects.abstract: The World Health Organization tracks air emissions and health impacts, including particulate matter and mortality rates. Our team explored the link between pollution and respiratory health.

projects.name: Truth or Dare
projects.abstract: The Truth or Dare App encourages users to disconnect from technology and reconnect with nature through playful challenges. It uses Figma prototypes, user flows, interviews, and personas to create a seamless, user-centered experience.
